**Rollback Plan**:
```bash
git revert [merge-commit-sha]
git push origin main
git tag -d v[X.Y.Z]
git push origin :refs/tags/v[X.Y.Z]
```

2. ✅ Fill out staging-validation-report.md

- 🎉 Celebrate deployment!
- 📊 Monitor for [24 hours minimum]
